item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-05-31
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Giorgio's of Gramercy (27 E. 21st St, btw Broadway & Park, New York). #
  • Flatiron #
  • Rockefeller Center #
  • I'm at Apple Store - 5th Ave (767 5th Avenue, btw 58th & 59th, New York). #
  • I'm at Stumptown Coffee Roasters (Ace Hotel) (18 West 29th Street, btw Broadway & 5th Ave, New York). #
  • I'm at MGM Grand at Foxwoods (240 MGM Grand Dr, Mashantucket). #
  • I'm at Juniors (240 MGM Grand Dr, Mashantucket). #
